FAQ

  • Q:What do you get in DishTV Maxi Sports Marathi HD?
    A:DishTV Maxi Sports Marathi HD has a total of 234 channels. It offers 44 popular channels &tv HD, Colors HD, SET HD, Sony Pal, Star Plus HD, STAR Utsav, STAR World HD, UTV Bindass, Zee Anmol, &Pictures HD, B4U Movies, Star Movies HD, Star Movies Select HD, UTV Action, UTV Movies, Zee Cinema HD, Aaj Tak, ABP News, CNBC Awaaz, India TV, NDTV India, News 24, News Live, News Nation, News18 India, Zee Hindustan, Zee News, Star Sports 1 HD, Star Sports 2 HD, Star Sports Select 1 HD, Star Sports Select 2 HD, Cartoon Network, Discovery Kids, Disney Channel, Disney Junior, Hungama TV, Pogo, 9XM, B4U Music, MTV, Discovery Science, History TV18 HD, Aastha and Sanskar. This pack has 43 HD and 191 SD channels. Explore more similar packs on DishTV.
  • Q:What is the Validity and Price of DishTV Maxi Sports Marathi HD?
    A:DishTV Maxi Sports Marathi HD comes with a starting price of Rs. 306 along with 28 days of validity.
  • Q:What is DishTV Customer Care Number?
    A:You can write an email to DishTV customer support at customercare@dishtv.in. Also, you can call on toll-free number 95017-95017.
